snippet: Robert Allenby withdrew from this week’s Humana Challenge in La Quinta, Calif. Allenby said he was beaten and robbed Friday night.
abstract: Golfer Robert Allenby withdraws from Humana Challenge in La Quinta, Calif, citing recovery from injuries sustained during violent robbery.
lead_paragraph: Robert Allenby withdrew from this week’s Humana Challenge in La Quinta, Calif. Allenby said he was beaten and robbed Friday night.
